name: Win Over the Flawed Girl
description:
「Win Over the Flawed Girl 」is an easy two-choice puzzle game to make the little flawed beauty girls (monsters, spirits and ghosts) happy！
Caution：If you make a wrong choice, you'll end up with a BAD ending！！

All the stages are free！
Live game welcome！

-------------------
How to play
-------------------
1）First, confirm the question
2）Make your choice！
3）If you are right, you will move on to the next question.

-------------------
Situation
-------------------
Kuchisake-onna
Hachishaku-sama
Sukima-onna
Hanako-san　　　　etc


EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
